history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go? For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER Childrens Hospital
TTS Okay, going to upmc children's hospital of pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 08:11 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 37 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue Opposite Craig Street </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER No.

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 37 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue Opposite Craig Street </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue Opposite Craig Street </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 69 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Wilkins avenue at Shady avenue FS.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 8:17pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 1 min to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Shady avenue at Wilkins avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
